document_data.name: The Going Down
document_data.mainbody: The '''Going Down''' was a sacred event observed by worshipers of [[Lathander]], the Morninglord.
document_data.History: The Going Down was a solemn ceremony performed under candlelight during a funeral. The ceremony was followed by a wake that lasted until the dawn prayers. The Going Down was never performed on someone who was supposed to be [[Raise dead|raised]] from the dead.
